apple_vendor_description: This heartfelt emoji on Apple devices showcases a loving couple of two men, rendered with distinct medium-light and medium-dark skin tones, their connection palpable through their tender embrace. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading imbues their forms with a warm, inviting glow, while the soft, rounded edges of their faces and attire speak to a gentle intimacy. The prominent, vibrant red heart between them, also sculpted with Apple's signature depth, symbolizes their strong bond, romantic love, and shared happiness, making it a perfect expression of affectionate relationships.
